short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An application that allows the user to start and stop at will a simple signaling server for initiating WebRTC connection in NetFlux.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An application that allows the user to start and stop at will a simple signaling server for initiating WebRTC connection in NetFlux.

The user can administrate the server, setting it on or off. When the server is on, the application displays the addresses where it can be accessed.
The application also enables the user to manage the connections of the server, by allowing him to close them from the application.
There is also a log field.

The application interacts with the chrome extension SigVer Launcher to give it the state of the server and to allow it to use the application and the server from its browser.
